about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Haida is a Commonwealth destroyer with unusual properties for her Smoke Generator consumable. It takes a whole 90 seconds to set smoke screens, which means you can do it as you move. This feature makes Haida an excellent key area fighter. She's an unpredictable and difficult opponent for most other destroyers. But even without smoke screens, Haida can go a long way due to her rapid-firing and long-range artillery that deals a lot of damage, and her four fast-moving torpedoes with a range of 8 km.

Advantages:

  • Six rapid-firing 120-mm guns with good traverse speed and a firing range of 12.3 km. Despite the caliber, the damage from an HE shell is no less than that of Soviet 130-mm guns, which is 1,900 HP.
  • Unusual properties of the Smoke Generator consumable: 10-second smoke screen dispersion time and 90-second action time of the smoke generator. Haida can stay invisible while moving at ¼ speed.
  • Excellent concealment. Detectability range by sea — 6.5 km.

This bundle also contains:

  • Commander with 6 skill points
  • a slot in the Port
  • 2,000 Doubloons
  • 42x common expendable economic bonuses of four types (Credits +20%, Ship XP +100%, Commander XP +100%, and Free XP +300%)
detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Haida is a Commonwealth destroyer with unusual properties for her Smoke Generator consumable. It takes a whole 90 seconds to set smoke screens, which means you can do it as you move. This feature makes Haida an excellent key area fighter. She's an unpredictable and difficult opponent for most other destroyers. But even without smoke screens, Haida can go a long way due to her rapid-firing and long-range artillery that deals a lot of damage, and her four fast-moving torpedoes with a range of 8 km.

Advantages:

  • Six rapid-firing 120-mm guns with good traverse speed and a firing range of 12.3 km. Despite the caliber, the damage from an HE shell is no less than that of Soviet 130-mm guns, which is 1,900 HP.
  • Unusual properties of the Smoke Generator consumable: 10-second smoke screen dispersion time and 90-second action time of the smoke generator. Haida can stay invisible while moving at ¼ speed.
  • Excellent concealment. Detectability range by sea — 6.5 km.

This bundle also contains:

  • Commander with 6 skill points
  • a slot in the Port
  • 2,000 Doubloons
  • 42x common expendable economic bonuses of four types (Credits +20%, Ship XP +100%, Commander XP +100%, and Free XP +300%)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

name: World of Warships — Haida Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.1
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Sound Card: DirectX 11

esrb.descriptors:
Violence
• Mostly realistic setting
• Photo-realistic depiction

Violence Against Non-Humans
• Violence is often depicted from a distance
• Violence is rarely depicted close-up
• No blood and gore

Language
• Minor profanities (e.g. "damn"; "hell")

Users Interact
• User generated content shared with others
